QuestData.Title: Reinforcements From Theramore
QuestData.Description: Hawthorne dead... my own son murdered... the situation in the Barrens is out of control, $n.$B$BI'm going to take charge of Fort Triumph and try to lock things down. To do that, I'm going to need reinforcements. Reinforcements that were promised from Theramore weeks ago!$B$BTravel to Theramore in Dustwallow Marsh and give Captain Garran Vimes an earful. What good is that blasted road through the swamp if the men and materiel aren't rolling in?
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Theramore Isle in Dustwallow Marsh and talk to Captain Garran Vimes in the main barracks.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Travel to Theramore Isle in Dustwallow Marsh and talk to Captain Garran Vimes in the main barracks.
QuestData.RewardText: What now, soldier?$B$BReinforcements? For the Barrens? We've been bleeding supplies and men there for months!$B$BDoes someone need to remind Twinbraid of the attack on Northwatch? Our losses at Honor's Stand? What happened to the men I sent to Fort Triumph? We've nothing to spare!$B$BListen $n, if you want to help out our cause, you'll focus your efforts here in Dustwallow. Between the deserters and the Horde encroachment... we could use a hand.
